thread.title: Dewey Cooperators Can’t Be Trusted, Defense Says
thread.title_full: Dewey Cooperators Can’t Be Trusted, Defense Says - WSJ

author: Sara Randazzo
title: Dewey Cooperators Can’t Be Trusted, Defense Says
text:
A defense lawyer for Dewey & LeBoeuf LLP’s former chief financial officer told jurors Thursday that they shouldn’t trust the testimony of cooperating witnesses that has formed the basis of a financial fraud case against leaders of the fallen law firm.
The cooperators seem to have pleaded guilty to Dewey-related crimes out of fear, the lawyer said, and not because they actually intended to defraud anyone at the once-prestigious... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
